CSGO is honestly fun to play if you have 4 other friends with the same skill level. Otherwise ,more often than not, you're going to get trolled/have a toxic teammate. the enemy team may even have a hacker, especially if you are just now getting CSGO.

[spoiler] Dont solo-queue ever! You'll be forever stuck in "silver limbo". [/spoiler]
